Room.Name: Teal Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Teal Avenue in the industrial section of the city.
Room.LongDescription: Many of the new ideas and concepts which basic research produces are turned into usable products by the factories on this street. On the east side you see a bright green building and a sign which says they specialize in enchanted rods and staves. They proudly state that they use only the latest spells in production.
